name: WiiU or 3DS Model File
summary: A JMDL file is a 3D model used by a Nintendo WiiU or 3DS video game. It contains a character, item, or location model used in-game. JMDL files are most notably used in Wii Fit U, Dragon Ball Fusions, and One Piece: Super Grand Battle! X.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
